name: molgenis-cosas
description: The `molgenis-cosas` repository contains all of the code and scripts used to create and maintain the samples database.

scripts.cosas: npm run build-cosas && npm run data-cosas
scripts.cosasportal: npm run build-cosasportal && npm run data-cosasportal
scripts.import: npm run import-cosasportal && npm run import-cosasrefs && npm run import-cosas
scripts.build: npm run build-cosas && npm run build-cosasrefs && npm run build-cosasportal
scripts.data: npm run data-cosas && npm run data-cosasrefs && npm run data-cosasportal
scripts.zip: zip -r _zip/cosas_datasets.zip emx/cosas emx/cosasportal emx/cosasrefs data/cosas data/cosasportal  -x "**/.DS_Store" && mv _zip/cosas_datasets.zip /Users/dcruvolo/OneDrive\ -\ UMCG/projects/cosas
